doc.name: InstantaneousDialogGenerator
doc.description: An actor that generates instantaneous dialog with a LookupTable. This actor outputs incrementing integers on the indexOutput port. A server is expected to receive an index number and output a token associated with this index, which the client receives on the dataInput port. The client then outputs this token on the dataOutput port. All ports are single ports.
doc.author: Paul Whitaker
doc.port: Input port for data from a server.
Output port for data. The type is the same as dataInput.
Output port for data indices. The type is integer.
